name: Wallet Warrior
description:
Created for the "Jam for all BASIC Dialects #1 Theme: Money Language: QB64 version of QBasic The dollars are attacking!  And an ATM machine!  And worse!  The future of the world is now in the hands of your tri-fold wallet!

===============================================

CONTROLS:

"C" to change weapons

"Space Bar" to fire

Arrow Keys to move

ESC to exit game

CREDITS:

All code and game assets created by 40wattstudio.
